pages.text: Qasam hay asman ki aur andhery mein roshan honay waly ki
Tujhy maloom bhi hay ky wo raat ko namodar honey wali chez kiya hay
Wo roshan sitara hay
Koi asa nahi jis per nigheban farishta na ho
Insan ko dekhna chaeiy kay kis chez say paida kiya gaya hay
Wo ik uchalty pani say paida kiya hay
Jo pait aur seney kay dirmiyan say nikalta hay
Be sahk wo usy pher lyney per yaqeenan qudrat rakhney wala hay
Jis din poshida bhedon ki janch partal hogi
To na hoga uskay pass kuch zor na madadgar
Barish waly asman ki qasam
Aur pahtney wali zameen ki qasam
Be-shak yeh (quran)albatta do tok faisla kerney wala kalam hai
Yeh hansi ki(aur be faeeda) baat nahi
Albatta kafir dao ghaat main nahi
Aur mein bhi aik chaal chalraha hun
Tu kafiron ko mohlat dey unhen thory dino chor dy
Apney buhat hi buland Allah kay nam ki pakizgi biyan ker
Jissney paida kiya aur sahi salim banaya
Aur jiss na(thek thak)andaza kiya aur phir rah dekhai
Aur jis nay taza ghass paida ki
Phir ussney is ko (sukha ker )siyah kora ker diya
Hum tujhy parhaein gay phir tu na bhoolay ga
Magar jo kuch Allah chahey wo zahir aur poshida ko janta hay
Hum apky liey asani paida kerdein gay
To ap nasehat kerty rahein ager nasehat kuch faida dy
Derney wala to nasehat lyga
(han)badbakht is say gurez karey ga
Jo bari aag mein jaey ga
Jahan phir won a mary ga jnajeiy ga(balky halat e nazah mein para rahy ga)
Besahk usney falah pali jo pak hogaya
Aur jis nay apney rab ka nam yad rakha aur namaz parhta raha
